Plate - Class in CircusOfPlates

plate - Variable in class CircusOfPlates.Plate

The Default Plate Height in pixels to be drawn on the screen

plateColors - Static variable in class CircusOfPlates.PlateBar
The colors of the plates that are generated randomly
PlateSky - Class in CircusOfPlates
The PlateSky class is designed for handling the falling state of plates and their motion during falling from bars until caught by the players or vanish The air factor is implemented here using static variables; The game speed can also be modified
PlateSky() - Constructor for class CircusOfPlates.PlateSky
initializes the starting elements for future management
plateSpacing - Static variable in class CircusOfPlates.Plate
The initial Plate Spacing between the start of the next plate to the start of the current plate
Player - Class in CircusOfPlates
The Player class handles all the operations supported by a player it also contains the player internal data managed by creators of the player
